description:
Bartolomeo and Cavendish introduce the Revolutionary Army. They talk about their key members, their relationship with Luffy and his crew, and how they have been working behind the scenes to overthrow the World Government.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Araburu Henkaku no Log! Anyaku Suru Kakumeigun!
Das Logbuch der stürmischen Revolution! – Das Geheimmanöver der Revolutionsarmee!
Le Log de l`insurrection. La secrète Armée révolutionnaire !
The Log of the Turbulent Revolution! The Revolutionary Army Maneuvers in Secret!
荒ぶる変革の記録[ログ]! 暗躍する革命軍!
